input_email_body:
Subject: Recurring Crash Issues

PowerPoint keeps crashing frequently during presentations My name is John Doe.. This might be caused by software conflicts or outdated drivers. Despite restarting, updating, and temporarily disabling antivirus, the problem still occurs. You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.
